security: Suggesting that PCI give DEVISTA-1 contacts in El Salvador (if PCI does not provide contacts) could compromise the safety of those contacts. Quoting directly: 'If PCI does not give DEVISTA-1 contacts in SALV, Station should pass to DEVISTA-I only first four names of above REF.'
summary: A cable instructing the station to pass the first four names of referenced contacts to DEVISTA-1 in El Salvador if PCI does not provide DEVISTA-1 contacts.
summary_one_paragraph: This cable instructs the recipient station to provide DEVISTA-1 with the first four names of contacts referenced in SALV 4839 if PCI is unable to supply DEVISTA-1 contacts in El Salvador. The WH/COMMENT suggests possible Communist contacts for DEVISTA-1.
title: Instructions Regarding DEVISTA-1 Contacts in El Salvador
